---
title: "Phase 2: Discovery"
---

## What You Will Do
- Frame research questions and hypotheses
- Map stakeholders and data sources
- Plan data collection with ethics in mind

## Deliverables
- Problem statement + research questions draft
- Stakeholder/data source map (one page)
- Mini proposal outlining methods and timeline

## Milestones
- **Week 3:** Submit problem statement for feedback
- **Week 4:** Share stakeholder map in class
- **Week 5:** Turn in mini proposal

## Activities
- Compare 2–3 example research questions; rewrite them with clearer variables
- Sketch a data collection plan (surveys, scraping, observations)
- Identify risks and mitigations (privacy, sampling, bias)

## Templates & Links
- Use the Weekly Journal Template in `99_Templates/Weekly_Journal_Template.md` for reflections
- Start your data source notes in `02_Literature/`
- Capture meeting notes in `00_Inbox/` then file them into `03_Project/`
